coded_answer.p: I'm pleaseantpleasantpleased to win the first prize in your competition - two weeks at Camp California in the USA.

As I'm an artistart student inat a particular College, I only cancan only go to your Camp California in July, because in thisthat month I got nohaven't got any classclasses, and I'm free to do whatever I want to. I'd like a log cabinslog cabin asfor my accomodationaccommodation, because it's safer and cleaner than a tentstent and I wouldn't share it towith anyone.

Painting and Photography are the activities good for megood activities for me. They fit tosuit myselfme because my art work develops itself in these areas. InThrough Painting I talk about human beings in this world, inon big canvases; and inthrough Photography, within Collages, I talk about anger and guiltyguilt in the families'family'sfamily linesline. So inat Camp California I would like to keep me on touching toin touch with these areas.

I'd like to ask you to send me $1000 for my art knowledge. With this amount I could buy a lot of art books, and records. InTo summarize, art and music need to be kept with me throughout these two weeks toso I do not forget my artistic life.
Shopping is something made, which do not need to be enjoyable. We can analizeanalyze when shopping is enjoyable, and when it is not.

There is joy in shopping when it is madedone by ourselves tofor ourselves. ItThat means buying whatever we like, just like clothes, records, rings, and books. What we like is based inon our relationshiprelationships towith anotherother people, in theat work or in the family. So we have enjoyablefun when we buy what we like followingaccording to anotherother people's views.

On the other hand, sickness in ourselves or our relatives mademakes us unhappyreluctant to buyshop. It is an obligation shoppingto shop for medicines, clothes tofor winter, doctordoctor's visitesvisits, and so forth. A death in the family is not alsoalso not an enjoyable shopping experience, because it is the highest point of the sickness. Buying coffins and graveyardsgraveyard plots to bury relatievesrelatives is not as enjoyable as buying clothes.

In summarizingsummary shopping can be enjoyable or not depending ofon our healthy statestate of health. GivingTo give examples: if we are healthy we buy clothes and Records, we enjoy ourselves; if we are sick, or our relatives are, we buy medicines and we do not enjoy ourselves because it is an obligation.
